question: Who among the following king was associated with Hathigumpha and Guntupalli inscriptions?
explanation:
• Naneghat inscription was issued by Naganika
  • Nasik Inscription was issued Gautami Balasri
  • The Hathigumpha and Guntupalli inscriptions of King kharavela mentions conflict between Satakarni-I and Kharavela for the possession of Krishna-Godavari basin.
